casebody.data:
COMMISSIONER OF LABOR
v.
WEEKLEY HOMES. No. 271P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 30, 2005. Thomas A. Farr, Phillip J. Strach, Bernhard Mueller, Cary, Robert E. Rader, Jr., for Weekley Homes. Jane Ammons Gilchrist, Assistant Attorney General, for Commissioner of Labor. J. Michael Carpenter, for National Asso. Home Bldrs., et al. J. Nicholas Ellis, Rocky Mount, Julie W. Hampton, Raleigh, for NC Asso. of Defense Attorneys. Richard M. Lewis, Raleigh, for Capital Associated Ind., et al.

The following order has been entered on the conditional motion filed on the 26th day of May 2005 by NC Citizens for Business and Industry and Carolinas Associated General Contractors for leave to file Amici Curiae Brief:

"Motion Dismissed as moot. By order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of June 2005."
